Data

Class Entry

  • java.lang.Object
    • Data.DataStorage
      • Data.Entry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<DataStorage>

    public class Entry
extends DataStorage
    Data representation of stored text and images. Automatically updates the DOM using the provided Node upon saving.
    Author:
    Hirsch Singhal

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Entry(org.w3c.dom.Node item, org.w3c.dom.Document doc, Notebook note)
      Used to load an unencrypted Entry from a Notebook.

      Used to load an unencrypted Entry from a Notebook.

      Used to create a new Entry from a Notebook.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entry

        public Entry(org.w3c.dom.Node item,
     org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
     java.lang.String title,
     Notebook note,
     javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec key,
     int maxSerial)
        Used to create a new Entry from a Notebook.
        Parameters:
        item - Node used to save this Entry's spot in the DOM.
        doc - Top level of the DOM. Used to generate new nodes.
        title - Title of the Entry.
        note - Parent Notebook that this Entry belongs to.
        key - Key used to encrypt/decrypt body and title. May be null.
        maxSerial - Serial number for this Entry. Used to order DataStorage objects.

      • Entry

        public Entry(org.w3c.dom.Node item,
     org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
     Notebook note)
        Used to load an unencrypted Entry from a Notebook.
        Parameters:
        item - Node used to save this Entry's spot in the DOM.
        doc - Top level of the DOM. Used to generate new nodes.
        note - Parent Notebook that this Entry belongs to.

      • Entry

        public Entry(org.w3c.dom.Node item,
     org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
     Notebook note,
     javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec key)
        Used to load an unencrypted Entry from a Notebook.
        Parameters:
        item - Node used to save this Entry's spot in the DOM.
        doc - Top level of the DOM. Used to generate new nodes.
        note - Parent Notebook that this Entry belongs to.
        key - Key used to encrypt/decrypt body and title. May be null.

        Returns:
        HTML as String.

        Sets HTML data.
        Parameters:

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Description copied from class: DataStorage
        Used to title tabs and list entries .
        Specified by:
        getTitle in class DataStorage
        Returns:
        Title of this DataStorage object (filename or Entry title).

      • getEditCount

        public int getEditCount()
        Returns:
        Number of times this Entry has been edited. Equal to the number of edit timestamps found in the DOM.

      • saveXML

        public boolean saveXML()
        Updates the DOM using the Node provided in the constructor. If data should be encrypted, this method does so. Forces the parent Notebook to save to the harddrive.
        Returns:
        Success of the save.

      • getTimestamp

        public java.util.Date getTimestamp()
        Returns creation timestamp.
        Returns:
        Time of creation.

      • getTimestampString

        public java.lang.String getTimestampString()
        Helper method for getTimestamp(). Formats it as a String, using the following format: "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss"
        Returns:
        String-formatted time of creation.

      • getEdits

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Date> getEdits()
        Returns:
        ArrayList of edit timestamps.

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(java.lang.String t)
        Sets the title of this Entry. Updates the DOM.
        Parameters:
        t - new title.

      • setTimestamp

        public void setTimestamp(java.util.Date parse)
        Sets a new creation time for this Entry. Updates the DOM.
        Parameters:
        parse - new creation timestamp.
